title: Table runner
medium:
Medium: Linen foundation, linen applique, linen and mercerized cotton embroidery
Technique: Plain weave foundation; applique of plain weave and embroidery using stem, satin and bottonhole stitches
description: Long and narrow rectangle with appliqued and embroidered stylized poppies and branches at each end. Pale yellow and beige on off-white. Hemmed on four sides.
name: Table runner
